Dashboard.repo_empty_repos_desc: Add your first project for analysis

Dashboard.settings_api_keys_revoke_key_desc: You are about to revoke key
Dashboard.settings_api_keys_revoke_note: This action cannot be undone. Any applications using this key will stop working immediately.
Dashboard.settings_api_keys_save_api_key_desc: Please copy the key now. We won't be able to show it again.
Dashboard.settings_api_keys_update_key_desc: Change name or description for key
Dashboard.settings_danger_delete_account_alert_des: This action is irreversible. Deleting your account entails the complete removal of saved credentials. You will also be immediately logged out from all devices.
Dashboard.settings_danger_delete_account_desc: Permanently delete account and all associated data
Dashboard.settings_danger_delete_account_dialog_de: You are about to delete your account!
Dashboard.settings_danger_delete_all_repos_desc: You are about to delete all repositories!
Dashboard.settings_danger_delete_all_repos_note_1: Permanently delete all repositories and associated data.
Dashboard.settings_danger_delete_all_repos_note_2: Your GitHub source codes will not be affected.
Dashboard.settings_danger_delete_all_repos_note_3: This action will not delete your GitHub/GitLab repositories. They will simply stop appearing in this service.
Dashboard.settings_danger_delete_all_repos_note_4: This action is irreversible. Deleting all repositories entails the complete removal of all generated documentation and calculated metrics.

Footer.all_rights_reserved: All rights reserved. Built by developers for developers.

Landing.section_analytics_card_desc: Real-time analysis of your repository health over the last 6 months.
Landing.section_analytics_subtitle: Track technical debt, identify "Bus Factor" risks, and visualize codebase complexity over time.
Landing.section_config_desc: Drop a simple config file in your root. We handle parsing, token limits, and prompt engineering automatically.
Landing.section_docs_desc: From high-level overview to low-level byte manipulation. We generate every format your team needs.
Landing.section_faq_a1: Absolutely. We use ephemeral containers for analysis. Your code is cloned, analyzed, and deleted immediately. We do not use your code to train our models (Zero Data Retention policy with OpenAI).
Landing.section_faq_a2: We use combined with AST (Abstract Syntax Tree) parsing. AST gives us 100% accurate structure (function names, params), while LLM explains the logic. This hybrid approach minimizes hallucinations.
Landing.section_faq_a3: Yes! We provide a GitHub Action and a CLI tool. You can set it to auto-update your `README.md` or `docs/` folder on every merge to main.
Landing.section_faq_a4: Legacy code is our specialty. Our "Bus Factor" analysis helps identify complex, undocumented parts of your system that need attention first.
Landing.section_faq_a5: We analyze Cyclomatic Complexity, Maintainability Index, and Bus Factor scores. These act as a health check for your repository, visualizing technical debt.
Landing.section_faq_q3: Can I run this in CI/CD?
Landing.section_faq_q4: Does it work with legacy code?
Landing.section_faq_q5: What kind of metrics do you generate?
Landing.section_features_ast_desc: We don't just guess. We parse the AST to understand your code structure accurately.
Landing.section_features_cli_desc: Integrate directly into your CI/CD pipeline or run locally with a single command.
Landing.section_features_desc: Everything you need to transform your codebase into clear, up-to-date documentation.
Landing.section_features_export_desc: Export to Markdown, PDF, Notion, or deploy as a static site automatically.
Landing.section_features_health_desc: Track documentation coverage and quality over time. Identify undocumented modules instantly.
Landing.section_features_security_desc: Your code never trains our models. SOC2 Type II compliant infrastructure.
Landing.section_hero_badge: Powered by Advanced AI & AST Engine
Landing.section_hero_desc: Generate Onboarding Guides, Architecture Maps, and Live Metrics. Turn your legacy code into a clear knowledge base instantly.
Landing.section_how_desc: We handle the heavy lifting asynchronously. You just get the result instantly.
Landing.section_how_status_msg: Documentation is generated automatically in background

Metadata.about_desc: Learn about the mission of Doxynix: helping developers understand legacy code and automate documentation updates using AI.
Metadata.about_title: About Us - The Team Behind Doxynix
Metadata.landing_desc: Automate technical documentation for your engineering team. Doxynix analyzes legacy code, generates architecture maps, and tracks complexity metrics in real-time.
Metadata.landing_title: Turn Code into Documentation - AI Analysis Tool
Metadata.privacy_desc: We value your privacy. Learn how Doxynix processes your code (in-memory only), secures your data, and complies with GDPR/security standards.
Metadata.sign_in_desc: Log in to your Doxynix dashboard to manage repositories and API keys.
Metadata.support_desc: Need help with Doxynix? Contact our support team for assistance with documentation generation, API keys, or billing.
Metadata.terms_desc: Read the Terms of Service for Doxynix. Understand your rights, usage limits, and our responsibilities regarding code analysis.

NotFound.footer: Check the URL or return to the homepage.
NotFound.sub_title: Sorry, this page does not exist.
NotFound.title: 404 — Page Not Found

Privacy.brands_uploadthing_desc: Storage for user files and avatars.
Privacy.section_contact_desc: If you have any questions, please contact us.
Privacy.section_data_account: Account: Name, Email, and Avatar. We receive this data automatically when you sign in via GitHub, Google, Yandex, or Magic Link.
Privacy.section_data_important: Important: We do not store your code in our database. It is processed in RAM and deleted immediately after analysis.
Privacy.section_data_source_code: Source Code: We access your repositories in Read-Only mode and only during documentation generation.
Privacy.section_data_technical: Technical Data: IP address, device type, browser data, and Cookies (used solely for authentication and analytics, without sharing with third parties for advertising purposes).
Privacy.section_introduction_content: Welcome to Doxynix ("we", "our", or "us"). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This document explains what data we collect and how we use it when you use doxynix.space.
Privacy.section_rights_desc: You have the right to request deletion of all your data at any time. To do this, email us or use the "Delete Account" button in profile settings. Deletion is irreversible.
Privacy.section_third_party_desc: We use trusted partners to operate the service. We transfer only the data necessary to perform specific technical tasks:
Privacy.section_third_party_footer: All listed providers are industry leaders and ensure data protection in accordance with international standards (GDPR, SOC2) as governed by their terms of use.
Privacy.section_usage_point_1: To generate documentation, diagrams, and code metrics.
Privacy.section_usage_point_2: For authorization and saving your report history.
Privacy.section_usage_point_3: To send important notifications (e.g., API changes).
Privacy.title: Privacy Policy

Terms.section_acceptance_content: Welcome to Doxynix. By using our website (doxynix.space) and analytics tools, you unconditionally agree to these terms. The service is not intended for persons under 13. By registering with Doxynix, you confirm that you are 13 years of age or older. If you do not agree with any point, please stop using the service.
Terms.section_billing_content: Basic features are provided for free. We reserve the right to introduce paid (Premium) plans in the future. You will be notified of billing changes in advance. Refunds for digital services are not provided unless required by law.
Terms.section_contact_content: For legal inquiries and service usage questions, contact us:
Terms.section_disclaimer_content_1: The service is provided on an "as is" basis. We strive for analysis accuracy but do not guarantee that generated documentation will completely match your code or that the service will operate without errors or interruptions.
Terms.section_disclaimer_content_2: We are not liable for any direct or indirect losses (including loss of data or profit) arising from the use of Doxynix. You use analysis results at your own risk.
Terms.section_disclaimer_note: This is an important section. Please read it carefully.
Terms.section_property_our_service: Our Service: The Doxynix interface itself, logos, documentation generation algorithms, and design are our intellectual property.
Terms.section_property_your_data: Your Data: We do not claim rights to your source code. All code you analyze via Doxynix remains your property.
Terms.section_termination_content: We reserve the right to block or delete your account without prior notice if you violate these terms (e.g., attempting to crash our server).
Terms.section_usage_intro: You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes. You are prohibited from:
Terms.section_usage_point_1: Using the service to analyze malware, viruses, or code that violates third-party rights.
Terms.section_usage_point_2: Attempting to disrupt the service (DDoS attacks, injections, API abuse).
Terms.section_usage_point_3: Attempting to access other users' accounts or private data.
Terms.title: Terms of Service
